The 30m DEM file (Waldemar_dtm_integrated_30m.tiff) was constructed using the SWOOP2020 dataset as well as bathymetry data from the GRCA, then re-exported to a 30m resolution, and is subject to the following license agreements:

- Contains information licensed under the Open Government Licence – Ontario”. See Open Government Licence (https://www.ontario.ca/page/open-government-licence-ontario).
- Contains Information made available under Grand River Conservation Authority’s Open Data Licence v2.0. 

The land cover and manning's roughness file (Waldemar_landcover2017_40m.tif) is also derived from the 2017 Land Cover dataset provided by the Grand River Conservation Authority, and is covered under the Grand River Conservation Authority’s Open Data Licence v2.0. 

Any other data files are covered under the package license agreement terms.
